name: Vegan Taco Mac and Cheese Bake
description: Vegan Mac and Cheese Taco Bake with Walnut Taco Meat and Vegan Cashew Queso combines two family favorites into one epic vegan casserole that comes together quickly! Make it tonight.
recipeIngredient: 3 tbsp sundried tomato packed in olive oil (or 1 tbsp tomato paste)
2 tsp chili powder blend (I use chipotle powder chili blend, which a lot more flavor of the chipotle chili)
¾ cup of raw cashews soaked in hot water for at least 15 minutes
½ tsp Chipotle pepper flakes or chipotle pepper powder
2 cups elbows or mac or other pasta
½ cup chopped tomatoes or fresh salsa

recipeInstructions.name: To make the walnut chickpea taco meat:

itemListElement.text: Add the walnuts to a food processor, and process until the mixture resembles bread crumbs.
itemListElement.name: Add the walnuts to a food processor, and process until the mixture resembles bread crumbs.

itemListElement.text: Add in the rest of the ingredients and process until the mixture is homogeneously combined and there are no whole chickpeas remaining, but it still has texture.
itemListElement.name: Add in the rest of the ingredients and process until the mixture is homogeneously combined and there are no whole chickpeas remaining, but it still has texture.

itemListElement.text: Transfer the mixture to a bowl, and taste and adjust flavor. If the mixture is too dry add in a tsp or so of oil, or lime juice, and mix in.
itemListElement.name: Transfer the mixture to a bowl, and taste and adjust flavor. If the mixture is too dry add in a tsp or so of oil, or lime juice, and mix in.

itemListElement.text: Drain the cashews, and add to a blender along with half a cup of water and the rest of the ingredients until really really smooth and set aside.
itemListElement.name: Drain the cashews, and add to a blender along with half a cup of water and the rest of the ingredients until really really smooth and set aside.

itemListElement.text: Grease a baking dish, about 8 by 10 inch baking dish, or similar size, really well. Add your pasta , and spread all over.
itemListElement.name: Grease a baking dish, about 8 by 10 inch baking dish, or similar size, really well. Add your pasta , and spread all over.

itemListElement.text: Scoop the walnut taco meat mixture using a cookie scoop or spoon, and place it on top of the elbows.
itemListElement.name: Scoop the walnut taco meat mixture using a cookie scoop or spoon, and place it on top of the elbows.

itemListElement.text: And some tomato or salsa, you can also add in the pickled Jalapenos if you like.
itemListElement.name: And some tomato or salsa, you can also add in the pickled Jalapenos if you like.

itemListElement.text: Drizzle your cashew queso and sprinkle some salt all over. Then pour 2 cups of water. all of the mixture should be evenly covered.
itemListElement.name: Drizzle your cashew queso and sprinkle some salt all over. Then pour 2 cups of water. all of the mixture should be evenly covered.

itemListElement.text: Cover the dish with foil and bake at 400 degrees Fahrenheit for 45 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Cover the dish with foil and bake at 400 degrees Fahrenheit for 45 minutes.

itemListElement.text: Remove the dish. You can check at 40 minutes if the top is set, and that the pasta is cooked from the edge and remove it or continue to bake another five minutes.
itemListElement.name: Remove the dish. You can check at 40 minutes if the top is set, and that the pasta is cooked from the edge and remove it or continue to bake another five minutes.

itemListElement.text: Sprinkle the top with some crushed tortilla chips, sliced up pickled jalapenos, and serve. You can also drizzle some thinned out vegan sour cream or reserve 1-2 tbsp queso and use that to garnish
itemListElement.name: Sprinkle the top with some crushed tortilla chips, sliced up pickled jalapenos, and serve. You can also drizzle some thinned out vegan sour cream or reserve 1-2 tbsp queso and use that to garnish

keywords: taco mac and cheese, vegan taco casserole, vegan taco mac bake
